favourite.article: In these times when greed for worldly grandiose and perversion have taken over the elect, even the church, this hymn has been divinely inspired to regenerate hearts for contentment. I am truly in love with this hymn.
The music is so amazing, have no doubt to listen to it over and over. Praise the Lord, our mighty God!

I am able to do all things In Him who empowers me. Nevertheless you did well To have fellowship with me In my affliction.
Thank You Lord! And God bless all brothers and sisters in Christ! Amen.
